duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and cultivate sales opportunities within the assigned territory through various sales methods, including cold calls, emails, and timely lead response.
Develop relationships with new and existing customers to meet established sales quota and provide product and pricing information.

Deliver realistic and accurate sales forecasting of potential customers, proactively visit and follow up with existing customers to ensure excellent customer experience, address and escalate any needs as they arise.
Participate in the customer journey, providing support to internal stakeholders to ensure the launch and onboarding of the customers is an excellent experience.
Attend trade shows and industry events to represent the company, meet KPI's and activity minimums, and provide regular and thorough communication to the sales leadership team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Communication, Business Administration, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
